title: RBI Hikes Repo Rate Amidst Inflation Concerns

content.detailed: The Reserve Bank of India increased the repo rate by 25 basis points to 6.75% to tackle rising inflation. The move is expected to impact loan EMIs and borrowing costs for businesses.
content.prelims: RBI hikes repo rate by 25 bps to 6.75%.
content.mains: Discuss the impact of RBI's repo rate hike on the Indian economy and inflation control.
content.oneLiner: RBI raises repo rate to curb inflation.

title: ISRO Successfully Launches Gaganyaan Test Flight

content.detailed: ISRO's Gaganyaan test flight marks a major milestone in India's human spaceflight program. The mission tested crew module separation and re-entry systems.
content.prelims: Gaganyaan test flight by ISRO successful.
content.mains: Explain the significance of Gaganyaan for India's space ambitions.

title: India Signs Free Trade Agreement with UK

content.detailed: India and the UK have signed a comprehensive free trade agreement, aiming to boost bilateral trade by reducing tariffs and easing market access.
content.prelims: India-UK FTA signed to boost trade.
content.mains: Analyze the benefits and challenges of the India-UK FTA.
content.oneLiner: India, UK sign free trade pact.

title: Monsoon Arrives Early in Kerala, IMD Reports

content.detailed: The Indian Meteorological Department announced the early onset of monsoon in Kerala, bringing relief to farmers and water-stressed regions.
content.prelims: Monsoon hits Kerala ahead of schedule.
content.mains: Discuss the impact of early monsoon on agriculture and water resources.

title: GST Council Reduces Tax on EV Batteries

content.detailed: The GST Council has slashed the tax rate on electric vehicle batteries from 18% to 5% to promote green mobility and EV adoption in India.
content.prelims: GST on EV batteries cut to 5%.
content.mains: Evaluate the impact of GST reduction on EV sector growth.

title: India Launches National Quantum Mission

content.detailed: The government has launched the National Quantum Mission to advance research in quantum computing, communication, and cryptography.
content.mains: Discuss the objectives and potential of India's National Quantum Mission.

title: Supreme Court Upholds Reservation for EWS

content.detailed: The Supreme Court has upheld the 10% reservation for Economically Weaker Sections (EWS) in education and government jobs.
content.mains: Critically examine the implications of EWS reservation.

title: India's GDP Grows at 7.2% in Q1

content.detailed: India's GDP growth rate for the first quarter of 2025 stood at 7.2%, driven by strong performance in manufacturing and services.
content.mains: Analyze the factors contributing to India's robust GDP growth.

title: India Hosts G20 Environment Ministers' Meeting

content.detailed: India hosted the G20 Environment Ministers' meeting, focusing on climate change, biodiversity, and sustainable development.
content.prelims: G20 Environment Ministers meet in India.
content.mains: Discuss India's role in global environmental governance.

title: India's Chandrayaan-3 Discovers Water Molecules on Moon

content.detailed: Chandrayaan-3's rover has detected water molecules in the lunar soil, a breakthrough for future lunar missions and research.
content.mains: Explain the significance of Chandrayaan-3's discovery for lunar exploration.

title: India, Japan Sign Defence Technology Pact

content.detailed: India and Japan have signed a defence technology cooperation agreement to jointly develop advanced military systems.
content.mains: Assess the impact of India-Japan defence cooperation.

title: Delhi Implements Odd-Even Scheme to Combat Pollution

content.detailed: Delhi government has reintroduced the odd-even vehicle scheme to reduce air pollution levels during peak smog season.
content.mains: Evaluate the effectiveness of the odd-even scheme in controlling air pollution.

title: India's First Hydrogen Train Flagged Off

content.detailed: India's first hydrogen-powered train has been flagged off, marking a significant step towards sustainable transportation.
content.mains: Discuss the potential of hydrogen fuel in India's transportation sector.

title: India, Australia Sign Critical Minerals Pact

content.detailed: India and Australia have signed an agreement to cooperate in critical minerals supply chain, essential for clean energy technologies.
content.mains: Analyze the strategic importance of critical minerals cooperation.

title: India's Digital Payment Transactions Hit Record High

content.detailed: India's digital payment transactions reached a record high, driven by UPI adoption and government's digital push.
content.prelims: Digital payments hit record high in India.
content.mains: Discuss the factors driving India's digital payment revolution.

title: India's Renewable Energy Capacity Crosses 100 GW

content.detailed: India's renewable energy capacity has crossed 100 GW, achieving a major milestone in the country's clean energy transition.
content.mains: Evaluate India's progress towards renewable energy targets.

title: India's Semiconductor Mission Gets Cabinet Approval

content.detailed: The Cabinet has approved India's Semiconductor Mission with a budget of Rs 76,000 crore to boost domestic chip manufacturing.
content.mains: Discuss the strategic importance of semiconductor manufacturing for India.

title: India, France Sign Defence Industrial Roadmap

content.detailed: India and France have signed a defence industrial roadmap to enhance cooperation in defence manufacturing and technology transfer.
content.mains: Analyze the strategic implications of India-France defence cooperation.

title: India's Startup Ecosystem Reaches 100 Unicorns

content.detailed: India's startup ecosystem has achieved the milestone of 100 unicorns, reflecting the country's growing innovation and entrepreneurship.
content.mains: Discuss the factors contributing to India's startup success.

title: India's Forest Cover Increases by 2,261 Sq Km

content.detailed: India's forest cover has increased by 2,261 square kilometers, according to the latest Forest Survey of India report.
content.prelims: India's forest cover increases by 2,261 sq km.
content.mains: Analyze the factors behind India's forest cover growth.

title: India's AI Mission Gets Cabinet Approval

content.detailed: The Cabinet has approved India's AI Mission with a budget of Rs 10,372 crore to boost artificial intelligence research and development.

title: India, Germany Sign Green Hydrogen Partnership

content.detailed: India and Germany have signed a partnership agreement to collaborate on green hydrogen development and deployment.

content.detailed: India's electric vehicle sales have crossed the 1 million mark, reflecting growing adoption of clean mobility solutions.

content.mains: Analyze the factors driving EV adoption in India.

title: India's Space Tourism Mission Announced

content.detailed: ISRO has announced plans for India's first space tourism mission, marking a new chapter in the country's space exploration.

title: India, Canada Sign Migration and Mobility Pact

content.detailed: India and Canada have signed a migration and mobility partnership agreement to facilitate legal migration and skill development.

title: India's Digital Health Mission Reaches 50 Crore Users

title: India's Green Bond Issuance Crosses $10 Billion
